SA11n1117:47: durlabhaḥ saddharme tadanukūlaḥ prayatno manuṣyaloke || iti |
SA11n1117:48: tadevaṃvidhaṃ samāgamamāsādya saṃvṛtiparamārthataḥ suviditasaṃsāraduḥkhasyopaśamanasukhābhilāṣiṇo buddhagotrānubhāvāttu yasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣotpadyate-
SA11n1117:49: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam |
SA11n1117:50: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram ||1 ||
SA11n1117:55: śraddhayamānu jinān jinadharmān śraddhayate cari buddhasutānām |
SA11n1117:56: bodhi anuttara śraddhayamāno jāyati citta mahāpuruṣāṇām ||
SA11n1117:57: śraddha purogata mātṛjanetrī pālika vardhika sarvaguṇānām |
SA11n1117:60: śraddha nidhānadhanaṃ caraṇāgraṃ pāṇi yathā śubhasaṃgrahamūlam ||
SA11n1117:61: śraddha pramodakarī parityāge śraddha praharṣakarī jinadharme |
SA11n1117:66: śraddha atikramu mārapathasya darśika uttama mokṣapathasya ||
SA11n1117:67: bījamapūtiku hetu guṇānāṃ śraddha virohaṇi bodhidrumasya |
SA11n1117:69: ye sadaśraddha sagaurava buddhe te tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajanti |
SA11n1117:70: ye tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajantī te guṇavāṃ stuta ye guṇavantaḥ ||
SA11n1117:71: ye sada śraddha sagaurava dharme te jinadharma atṛpta śṛṇontī |
SA11n1117:72: ye jinadharma atṛpta śṛṇontī teṣvadhimukti acintiyadharma ||
SA11n1117:73: ye sadaśraddha sagaurava saṃghe te avivartika saṃghaprasannāḥ |
SA11n1117:75: ye avivartika śraddhabalāto indriya tīkṣṇa prabhāsvara teṣām |
SA11n1117:76: indriya tīkṣṇa prabhāsvara yeṣāṃ tehi vivarjita pāpakamitrāḥ ||
SA11n1117:77: yehi vivarjita pāpakamitrāḥ dhārmika mitra parigraha teṣām |
SA11n1117:78: dhārmikamitra parigraha yeṣāṃ te vipulaṃ kuśalopacinonti ||
SA11n1117:83: yeṣupapadyati bodhayi cittaṃ te abhiyukta maharṣiguṇeṣu ||
SA11n1117:84: ye abhiyukta maharṣiguṇeṣu jāta ye buddhakule anujātāḥ |
SA11n1117:87: āśayu yeṣa prasādaviśuddhaḥ teṣa adhyāśayu uttama śreṣṭhaḥ ||
SA11n1117:88: yeṣa adhyāśayu uttama śreṣṭhaste sada pāramitāsu caranti |
SA11n1117:89: ye sada pāramitāsu carantī te pratipanna iho mahayāne ||
SA11n1117:90: ye pratipanna iho mahayāne te pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān |
SA11n1117:91: ye pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān teṣu anusmṛti buddha amedyā ||
SA11n1117:92: yeṣu anusmṛti buddha amedyā te sada paśyiya cintiya buddhān |
SA11n1117:93: ye sada paśyiya cintiya buddhān teṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ ||
SA11n1117:94: yeṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ teṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmaḥ |
SA11n1117:95: yeṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmaḥ te sadadhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhiḥ ||
SA11n1117:98: durlabha sattva pṛthagjanakāyā ye imi śraddadhi īdṛśi dharmān |
SA11n1117:99: ye tu śubhopacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāste imi śraddadhi hetubalena ||
SA11n1117:101: no tatu tādṛśu puṇyaviśeṣo yādṛśa śraddadhato iti dharmān ||iti |
SA11n1117:103: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena niryānti nāyakāḥ |
SA11n1117:105: aśrāddhasya manuṣyasya śuklo dharmo na rohati |
SA11n1117:110: tadevaṃ śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kartavyaṃ sarvapuṇyasaṃgrahatvāt |
SA11n1117:116: eṣa saṃgraha dharmāṇāṃ bhavate tena ca priyaḥ ||iti |
SA11n1117:117: tathāryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre'pi varṇitam-bodhicittaṃ hi kulaputra bījabhūtaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇām |
SA11n1117:138: yathoktam-tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ aṇḍakoṣaprakṣipto'pi kalaviṅkapoto asaṃbhinnāṇḍaḥ aniṣkrāntaḥ koṣātkalaviṅkarutameva muñcati,
SA11n1117:139: evameva mañjuśrīḥ avidyāṇḍakoṣaprakṣipto'pi bodhisattvo asaṃbhinnātmadṛṣṭiraniṣkrāntastraidhātukādbuddharutameva muñcati yadidaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitarutameva ||
SA11n1117:140: sarvadharmāpravṛttinirdeśe'pi kathitam- jayamateśca bodhisattvasya pṛthivī vidāramadāt |
SA11n1117:148: sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu punaraśītiṃ yojanasahasrāṇi pratyākṛṣya pratyudāvartyeta |
SA11n1117:152: bhagavānāha- evameva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścidbodhicittamutpādya mahāyānaṃ na dhārayati,
SA11n1117:161: yadapi tasya bodhisattvasya bodhibhāvanātaḥ prajñendriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ,
SA11n1117:164: tadevameṣā śūnyatānadhimuktirmahāyānānabhiratiśca asaṃpūrṇādhimukticittacaryasyāpi prāyo na saṃdṛśyate,
SA11n1117:166: sa hi ratnameghe sarvabālacaritavipattisamatikrāntaḥ paṭhayate asaṃkhyeyasamādhidhāraṇīvimokṣābhijñāvidyāvikrīḍito'nantadharmārāmaratinirāmiṣāparānta-kalpakoṭayanābhoganirvikalpaprītivegālokapratilabdhaśca aprameyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparama mahāyānaprasthānavicitrabhāvanāsaṃpūrṇaparārthapratipattiniryāṇapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārābhinirhārābhinirvṛttiḥ pūrvayogaśatasahasrasamṛddhaśca paṭhayate |
SA11n1117:169: na cātra icchayā kiṃcidviśeṣacinhaṃ nītārthaṃ kartuṃ labhyate |
SA11n1117:179: āha- kathaṃ bhagavan sattvā aparityaktā bhavanti?
SA11n1117:186: yathā daśadharmakasūtre deśitam-iha kulaputra bodhisattvagotrasthaḥ sannanutpāditabodhicittaḥ tathāgatena vā tathāgataśrāvakeṇa vā saṃcodyamānaḥ saṃvedyamānaḥ samādāpyamāno'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbo[dhau] bodhicittamutpādayati-idaṃ prathamaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya |
SA11n1117:187: saṃbodhervā bodhicittasya vā avarṇa bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayati-idaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇam |
SA11n1117:188: sa satvānanāthā[natrāṇā] naśaraṇānadvīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittamupasthāpya yāvadanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayati-idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya |
SA11n1117:189: sa tathāgatasya sarvākāraparipūrṇatāṃ dṛṣṭvā prītimutpādya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayati-idaṃ caturtha kāraṇamiti ||
SA11n1117:190: tacca bodhicittaṃ dvividham-bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca bodhiprasthānacittaṃ ca |
SA11n1117:192: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te sattvāḥ sarvaloke ye'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ praṇidadhati |
SA11n1117:194: tatra bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ mayā buddhena bhavitavyamiti cittaṃ praṇidhānādutpannaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1117:197: yathoktaṃ bhadrakalpikasūtre-ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato yatra nakṣatrarājena tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ tāmbūlapatraṃ dattvā gopālakabhūtena |
SA11n1117:198: evaṃ vidyutpradīpo nāma tathāgato yatra yaśasā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ daśikāṃ dattvā tantra(ntu)
SA11n1117:200: evamanantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrārciṣmatā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ tṛṇapradīpaṃ datvā nagarāvalambakabhūtena |
SA11n1117:201: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ datvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenetyādi ||
SA11n1117:204: yathāryamaitreyavimokṣe varṇitam-tadyāpi nāma kulaputra bhittamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
SA11n1117:211: yenāpararājāvavādakasūtre kathitam-yasmācca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ,
SA11n1117:212: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarva sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum ,
SA11n1117:214: tasmāttahiṃ tvaṃ mahārāja evameva samyaksaṃbodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ...... ca praṇidhiṃ ca gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo'pi śayāno'pi jāgradapi bhuñjāno'pi pibannapi satatasamitamanusmara,
SA11n1117:220: tataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāpratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya |
SA11n1117:221: evaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ san rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasi,
SA11n1117:224: atraiva cāsya vipāka uktaḥ-sa khalu punastvaṃ mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlakarmaṇo vipākena anekaśatakṛtvo deveṣupapanno'bhūḥ |
SA11n1117:227: na ca tāvattava mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittasya kuśalakarmaṇa ūnatvaṃ vā apūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate |
SA11n1117:228: api ca mahārāja ekamapi samyaksaṃbodhicittaṃ sarvasattvottāraṇārambaṇatvāt sarvasattvāmocanārambaṇatvāt sarvasattvasamāśvāsanārambaṇatvāt sarvasattvaparinirvāṇārambaṇatvādaprameyāsaṃkhyeyakuśalopacayam |
SA11n1117:232: idaṃ tu vaktavyam - kimabhūmipraviṣṭasyāpi bodhisattvasaṃvarādhikāro'sti na veti?
SA11n1117:235: daśabhūmikasūtre tu prathamāyāṃ bhūmau darśitam- na ca kaṃcit satkāraṃ kasyacitsakāśātpratikāṅkṣati anyatra mayaivaiṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopakaraṇabāhulyamupanāmayitavyamiti ||
SA11n1117:236: tathā cāha- pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau suvyavasthito bhavatyacalanayogeneti |
SA11n1117:238: ākaśagarbhasūtre tvāha- śrāvakayānamevāsya na bhavati prāgeva mahāyānamiti ||
SA11n1117:246: tatra abhyāsāyogyatayā prativedhavākyena vā ādikarmikabodhisattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ bhavedetat |
SA11n1117:253: ayaṃ ca saṃvaraḥ strīṇāmapi mṛdukleśānāṃ bodhyabhilāṣacittānāṃ labhyate |
SA11n1117:254: uktaṃ hi bodhisattvaprātimokṣe-caturbhiḥ śāriputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ bodhisattvāḥ satyavādino bhavantītyārabhyāha- iha śāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya ārabdhavīryo viharati kuśaladharmaparyeṣaṇāyetyārabhya sarva upadeśaḥ ||
SA11n1117:256: evaṃ hyasya śikṣātikrame tīvramapatrāpyaṃ guruvisaṃvādanabhayaṃ cotpadyate |
SA11n1117:258: ata eva bodhisattvāḥ tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ śikṣāṇāmanyatamaśikṣāniṣpattikāmāḥ samādānaṃ kurvanti |
SA11n1117:259: tasya ca kalyāṇamitrasyābhāve daśadigavasthitabuddhabodhisattvābhimukhībhāvabhāvanayā saṃvaro grāhyaḥ saṃvaramātmabalaṃ ca tulayitvā |
SA11n1117:260: anyathā tu sarvabuddhabodhisattvāḥ sadevakaśca loko visaṃvāditaḥ syāt |
SA11n1117:261: saddharmasmṛtyupasthānasūtre hi kiṃcinmātraṃ cintayitvāpi adadataḥ pretagatiruktā pratijñātaṃ ca - adadato narakagatiḥ,
SA11n1117:263: ata evoktaṃ dharmasaṃgītisūtre-satyagurukeṇa kulaputra bodhisattvena bhavitavyam |
SA11n1117:265: tatra kulaputra katamatsatyaṃ yadbodhisattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya taccitaṃ jīvitahetorapi na parityajati,
SA11n1117:267: idaṃ bodhisattvasya satyam- yatpunarbodhisattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya paścāttaccitaṃ parityajati,
SA11n1117:270: āryasāgaramatisūtre'pi deśitam-syādyathāpi nāma sāgaramate rājā vā rājamātro vā sarvanāgarakaṃ janaṃ śvobhaktenopanimantryopekṣako bhavet,
SA11n1117:274: evameva sāgaramate yo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāśvāsya atīrṇatāraṇāyāmuktamocanāyānāścastāśvāsanāya yāvanna bāhuśrutye'bhiyogaṃ karoti,
SA11n1117:277: evaṃ ca taṃ pūrvabuddharśinyo devatā uccagghanti vivādayanti |
SA11n1117:279: tasmāttarhi sāgaramate na sā bodhisattvena vāgbhāṣitavyā yayā sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ visaṃvādayet |
SA11n1117:280: punaraparaṃ sāgaramate bodhisattvaḥ kenacidevādhīṣṭo bhavati dharmeṣvarthakaraṇīyeṣu |
SA11n1117:281: tatra bodhisattvena vāgbhāṣitā bhavati yāvadātmaparityāgo'pi bodhisattvena kartavyo bhavet |
SA11n1117:282: tatra na punaḥ sa sattvo visaṃvādayitavya iti ||
SA11n1117:285: na punaryo'ntaśa ekamapi yāvajjīvaṃ kuśalaṃ karmapathaṃ na rakṣati,
SA11n1117:286: atha na punarevaṃ vadati- ahaṃ mahāyāniko'haṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhi paryeṣāmīti,
SA11n1117:287: sa pudgalaḥ paramakuhako mahāmṛṣāvādikaḥ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ purato visaṃvādako lokasyocchedavādī |
SA11n1117:290: yāvatkālaṃ ca śaknoti tāvatkālaṃ kuśalaṃ samādāya vartitavyam |
SA11n1117:291: etacca bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhasūtre draṣṭavyam -yastu mahāsattva evaṃ śrutvāpi bodhisattvacaryāduṣkaratāmapi prajñayāvagāhyotsahata eva sakaladuḥkhitajanaparitrāṇadhuramavavoḍhum,
SA11n1117:292: tena vandanapūjanapāpadeśanapuṇyānumodanabuddhādhyeṣaṇayācanabodhipariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā kalyāṇamitramadhyeṣya taduktānuvādena svayaṃ vā vaktavyam- samanvāhara ācārya ahamevaṃ nāmetyuktvā |
SA11n1117:293: yathā āryamañjuśrībuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhālaṃkārasūtre bhagavatā mañjuśriyā pūrvajanmāvadāne caryopetaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ tathotpādayitavyam |
SA11n1117:300: adyāgre na kariṣyāmi bodhiṃ prāpsyāmi yāvatā |
SA11n1117:311: yathā tenākṣobhyeṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtenaivaṃ vāgbhāṣitāvisaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuryadi sarvasyāṃ jātau na pravrajeyamiti |
SA11n1117:315: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasyāṃ jātau pravrajati,
SA11n1117:318: paramo hyayaṃ śāriputra lābho yaduta gṛhāvāsānniṣkramaṇamiti |
SA11n1117:326: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ vartamānānāgatasarvaduḥkhadaurmanasyopaśamāya vartamānānāgatasukhasaumanasyotpādāya ca niḥśāṭhayataḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥparākramaiḥ prayatnaṃ karoti |
SA11n1117:333: saṃkṣepato'nāpattiḥ svaśattayaviṣayeṣu kāryeṣu tatra niṣphalatayā śikṣayā prajñaptyabhāvāt |
SA11n1117:346: kutaḥ ? etadadhyāśayasaṃcodanasūtre vacanāt- api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣitam |
SA11n1117:358: yasya kasyacinmaitraiya ebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā,
SA11n1117:359: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā buddhasaṃjñotpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā |
SA11n1117:363: tatra maitreya ya imāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipet-naitāni buddhabhāṣitānīti,
SA11n1117:366: dharma pratikṣipya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā apāyagāmī bhavati ||
SA11n1117:370: yathoktaṃ praśāntaviniścayaprātihāryasūtreyaśca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vaśirājamahāmaṇiratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā dadyāt,
SA11n1117:371: evaṃ dadat gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād,
SA11n1117:372: yo vā anyo mañjuśrīrbodhisattva imānevaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā ekāntena gatvā cittenābhinirūpayet,
SA11n1117:378: yathātraivāha-tatra mañjuśrīrye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ sattvāsteṣāmekaikaḥ sattvo rājā bhavejjambūdvīpādhipatiḥ,
SA11n1117:386: sacenmañjuśrīrbodhisattva evamucyamāne no trasyati na saṃtrāsamāpsyate antaśa ekacittotpādenāpi na bibheti na biṣīdati na vicikitsate,
SA11n1117:389: ayaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvaścittaśūro dānaśūraḥ śīlaśūraḥ kṣāntiśūraḥ vīryaśūraḥ dhyānaśūraḥ prajñāśūraḥ samādhiśūraḥ iti vaktavyaḥ |
SA11n1117:390: sacenmañjuśrīrbodhisattvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na kupyati na ruṣyati na khiladoṣacittamutpādayati,
SA11n1117:397: chatraiḥ patākāmi ca dīpamālaiḥ kalpāna koṭayo yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ ||
SA11n1117:398: yaścaiva saddharma pralujyamāne nirudhyamāne sugatasya śāsane |
SA11n1117:399: rātriṃdivaṃ eka careya śikṣām idaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭaṃ bhoti ||
SA11n1117:402: yathoktamāryaratnameghe - kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti?
SA11n1117:403: iha bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ vicārayati-na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
SA11n1117:404: kiṃ tarhi yānīmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisattvasamudācārā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptāni,
SA11n1117:417: yathoktaṃ bodhisattvaprātimokṣe - yo bodhisattvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena duḥkhakṣayagāmī,
SA11n1117:418: sacedvodhisattvasya taṃ mārgaṃ parigṛhyāvasthitasyāpi kalpakoṭeratyayenaikaṃ sukhacittamutpadyeta antaśo niṣadyācittamapi,
SA11n1117:419: tatra bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam- sarvasattvānāmātyayiṃka parigṛhyaitadapi me varjayanniṣīdāmīti parigṛhyet |
SA11n1117:420: tamapi mañjuśrīrāha-pañcemāni devaputra ānantayāṇi yairānantaryaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante |
SA11n1117:422: yadā devaputra bodhisattvo'dhyāśayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya nāntarā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittamutpādayati,
SA11n1117:424: sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ cittamutpādya nāntarā mātsaryacittena sārdhaṃ saṃnyasati,
SA11n1117:426: sarvasattvā mayā trātavyā ityevaṃ cittamutpādya nāntarā sīdati,
SA11n1117:428: anutpannāniruddhān sarvadharmānavabhotsya ityevaṃ cittamutpādya nāntarā dṛṣṭigateṣu prapatati,
SA11n1117:430: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmānavabhotsya ityevaṃ cittamutpādya nāntarā tiṣṭhati,
SA11n1117:437: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye'smin pūtike samyak |
SA11n1117:442: ye kecit sattvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahastatra nidānamūlam |
SA11n1117:443: tasmāttyajedyatra bhaveta tṛṣṇā utsṛṣṭatṛṣṇasya hi dhāraṇī bhavet ||iti ||
SA11n1117:444: bodhisattvaprātimokṣe kathitam - punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu parakīyasaṃjñāmutpādayati |
SA11n1117:479: ābhistisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣya mitre'mitrasaṃjñotpādayitavyā- amitraṃhyetanmama, na mitram |
SA11n1117:480: yo'hamasyārthāya buddhaprajñaptāyāḥ śikṣāyā uddharatvādgatvā asmin putre'tiriktataraṃ premotpādayāmi,
SA11n1117:482: tena tathā tathā cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathāsya sarvasatveṣu putrapremānugatā maitryutpadyate |
SA11n1117:484: evaṃ cānena yoniśaḥ pratyavekṣitavyam-anyata eṣa āgataḥ,anyato'ham |
SA11n1117:488: yāvadevaṃ hi gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisattvena na kasmiṃścidvastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ,
SA11n1117:492: sacetpunargṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ yācanaka upasaṃkramya kiṃcideva vastu yāceta,
SA11n1117:494: naivaṃ cittaṃ nidhyāpayitavyam - yadyahametadvastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam,
SA11n1117:499: etacca vastu parityajya ahaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi |
SA11n1117:500: etacca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati |
SA11n1117:501: etacca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyamavipratisāritāṃ ca janayiṣyati |
SA11n1117:514: yathainaṃ ca tavābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvānāṃ ceti |
SA11n1117:515: evaṃ khalu gṛhapate tena yācanakaḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ ||
SA11n1117:516: etacca saṃjñapanamupari doṣaparihārāyoktam- mā bhūdbodhisattvasya tatrāprasādo bodhisattve vā yācanakasyeti |
SA11n1117:519: yathāha bodhisattvaprātimokṣa-catvāra ime śāriputra dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ na saṃvidyante |
SA11n1117:524: nāhaṃ śakto'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhumiti līna cittaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na saṃvidyate |
SA11n1117:532: tathā - cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā bhavanti |
SA11n1117:550: evaṃ nārāyaṇaparipṛcchāyāmapyuktam- na tadvastūpādātavyaṃ yasmin vastuni nāsya tyāgacittamutpadyate |
SA11n1117:552: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe notsarjanacittamutpādayet,
SA11n1117:553: na sa parivāra upādātavyo yasmin yācanakairyācyamānasya parigrahabuddhirutpadyate |
SA11n1117:559: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam,
SA11n1117:560: ayaṃ mamātmabhāvaḥ sarvasattvebhyaḥ parityaktaḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ prāgeva bāhyāni vastūni |
SA11n1117:561: yasya yasya sattvasya yena yena yadyatkāryaṃ bhaviṣyati,
SA11n1117:569: api tu khalu punaryasya yasya yena yena yadyatkāryaṃ bhaviṣyati,
SA11n1117:574: sattvānugrahāya sattvakāruṇyena sattvānukampayā teṣāmeva satvānāṃ saṃgrahāya,
SA11n1117:575: yathā me'mī sattvāḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhiprāptasya dharmajānakāḥ syuriti |
SA11n1117:577: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā hriyamāṇasya,
SA11n1117:578: gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ tvaktaḥ patrato vā hriyamāṇasya puṣpata phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya naiva bhavati vikalpaḥ-mūlato me hriyate yāvatsārato me hriyata iti |
SA11n1117:579: api tu khalu punaravikalpa eva hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ vyādhīnapanayati |
SA11n1117:580: ekameva kulaputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asmiṃścāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñotpādayitavyā |
SA11n1117:585: āryākṣayamatisūtre'pi deśitam- ayameva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu kṣapayitavyaḥ |
SA11n1117:586: tadyathāpi nāma imāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhātuśca nānāsukhairnānāparyāyairnānārambaṇairnānopakaraṇairnānāparibhogaiḥ sattvānāṃ nānopabhogaṃ gacchanti,
SA11n1117:587: evameva ahamimaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānā[sukhai]rnānāparyāyairnānārambaṇairnānopakaraṇairnānāparibhogairvistareṇa sarvasattvānāmupabhogyaṃ kariṣyāmīti |
SA11n1117:588: sa imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan kāyaduḥkhatāṃ ca pratyavekṣate,
SA11n1117:590: āryavajradhvajasūtre'pyāha- iti hi bodhisattva ātmānaṃ sarvasattveṣu niryātayan sarvakuśalamūlopakāritvena sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaiḥ sa [manvā]haran pradīpasamamātmānaṃ sarvasattveṣūpanayan sukhasamamātmānaṃ sarvasattveṣvadhitiṣṭhan dharmakukṣisamamātmānaṃ sarvajagati saṃdhārayan,
SA11n1117:630: karṇau nāsā saṃparityajan yācanakebhya upasaṃkrāntebhyo bodhisattvacaryopāttatathāgata kulakulīnasaṃbhūtacittaḥ sarvabodhisattvānusmaraṇavihāraprasṛtaḥ,
SA11n1117:633: iti hi bodhisattvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno......vācā premaṇīyayā maitryā upacāravitatayā bhadre siṃhāsane rājārhe niṣādya taṃ yācanakamabhibhāṣate hṛṣṭaḥ akruṣṭacitto bhūtvā akṣatacitto'nupahatacitto mahātmavaṃśalā....[ci]tto buddhavaṃśasaṃbhūtacitto'lulitasaṃtānacitto mahāsthāmabalādhāno'nadhyavasitaśarīracitto'nabhiniviṣṭavacanacitto jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakānmukhājjihvāyācanakasya sarvaśarīramadhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryopacārām- gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvām,
SA11n1117:635: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi prītamānasa ātmanā pramudito hṛṣṭaḥ prītisauma[na]syajāta iti |
SA11n1117:636: sa śiraḥ parityajan sarvadharmāgraśiraḥ paramajñānamavataran sarvasattvaparitrāṇaśiro bodhi....gacchan sarvajagadagryaśiraḥ anupamajñānamabhilaṣan sarvādikchiraḥ prāptuṃ jñānarājamadhimucyamāno'nuttarasarvadharmaiśvaryaśīrṣatāṃ paripūrayitukāmo'nantayācanakaprītiparisphuṭacetāḥ |
SA11n1117:637: iti hi bodhisattvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ śraddhāhastaprayuktenānugrahacāritreṇa bodhisattvasiṃhāvikramatyāgapratatapāṇinā vyavasargābhiratena hastapādaparityāgena mahāpratiṣṭhānakramatalavyatihāreṇa bodhisattvacaryādhyavasāyena vedanānupahatatayā dānaprasādaśattayā vimalacittotpādasaṃvaro niṣparyavasthānajñānadharmaśarīrāchinnābhinnāluptakāyasaṃjñaḥ anīcacittaḥ sarvamārakarmakalyāṇamitropastabdhabṛṃhitacetāḥ sarvabodhisattvasaṃvarṇitaikatyāganiryāṇaḥ |
SA11n1117:638: iti hi bodhisattvaḥ svaśarīramākṣipya rudhiramanuprayacchan yācakebhyaḥ praharṣitabodhicitto bodhisattvacaryābhilaṣitacito'paryāttaveditacittaḥ sarvayācanakābhilaṣitacittaḥ sarvapratigrāhakāvidviṣṭacittaḥ sarvabodhisattvatyāgapratipatpratipanno'nivartyayā prītiprastrabdhyā svaśarīrānapekṣacittaḥ svaśarīrādrudhiramanuprayacchan jñānāyatanamahāyānaprasṛtacetā mahāyānāvinaṣṭamanā iṣṭamanāstuṣṭamanāḥ prītamanā muditamanā maitryamanāḥ sukhamanāḥ prasannamanāḥ pramuditaprītisaumanasyajāto majjāmāṃsaṃ svaśarīrāt parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ kalyāṇatyāgayā yācakābhilaṣitayā vācā tān yācakānabhilapan-gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrānmajjāmāṃsaṃ yathākāmakaruṇayā tulyaprītivivardhanena tyāgacittena |
SA11n1117:640: sarvabodhisattvasamatopāttairmahādānārambhairmanasākāṅkṣitaiḥ sarvayācakairananutāpyacittairdānavastubhiḥ apratyavekṣitena karmavipākapratyayena sarvalokadhātvavimukhayā sarvabuddhakṣetrālaṃkāravyūhapūjayā sarvajagadabhimukhayā karuṇāparitrāṇatayā |
SA11n1117:642: sarvādhvasamatājñānena.....lokābhimukhenāparāntakoṭīgatakalpavyavasāyena bodhisattvapraṇidhānena aparitrasyanābhimukhenākhedacittotpādena bodhisattvaḥ svahṛdayaṃ parityajan yācanakebhyo dānavaṃśaśikṣitacittaḥ pāramitāniṣpādanacittaḥ sarvabodhisattvadānānuddhatasupratiṣṭhitacittaḥ adhiṣṭhānasarvayācanakapratimānanacittaḥ,
SA11n1117:648: parityajan yācanakābhiprasannayā dṛṣṭayā prasannaprītyākārairnetrairbodhisattvaniryātena premṇā avyutthitamanasikāreṇa tyāgena asārātkāyātsupratyavekṣitena sārādānacittena śmaśānaparyantena kāyānusmṛtimanasikāreṇa vṛkaśṛgālaśvabhakṣyaṃ śarīraṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ parabhaktimanasikṛtayā śarīrānityatayā apaviddhaśarīreṇa parabhaktacetanena evaṃ dharmamanasikāraprayukto bodhisattvastān yācanakānanimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇaḥ evaṃ cittamutpādayati-yadi cāhametadyācanakasyaitaccharīrādantrayakṛdbukkāphupphusaṃ dadyāma āyuḥkṣapaparyante |
SA11n1117:650: sa evaṃ manasikārasaṃtoṣitena saṃtānenaivaṃ dharmajñānenāśayena kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena yācanakadarśanena asārātkāyātsāramādātukāmo dharmakāmatayā svamāṃsānnakhaṃ parityajanneva tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayatītyātmabhāvotsargaṃ kṛtvā ||
SA11n1117:651: bhogapuṇyotsargo'pyatraivoktaḥ-iti hi bodhisattvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣvanyānyapudgaladigāgateṣvaprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu bodhisattvaśravāgateṣu bodhisattvaśabdaṃ śrutvā āgateṣu bodhisattvapratyayāvakāśagateṣu bodhisattvadānapūrvaṃ praṇidhānaśruteṣu,
SA11n1117:654: āgatayācanakakṣamāpaṇacetanaḥ-mayaiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyā abhaviṣyata,
SA11n1117:655: yena yuṣmākamāgamanaklamo na syāt - evaṃ samṛddhapraṇipātena kṣamayati sarvayācanakān |
SA11n1117:656: kṣamayitvā snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayopakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati-yadidaṃ maṇiratha[n jambu]dvīpakalyāṇakanyāratnaparipūrṇān,
SA11n1117:661: tathā atraiva deśitam - maṇirathān vā dadānaḥ sarvaratnajālasaṃcchannānājāneyahastyupetān savāhanān candanarathān dadāno ratnacakrarathyaprayuktān ratnasiṃhāsanapratiṣṭhitān yāvannānāratnachatrasaṃchannavyūhān ratnavitānavitatasaṃchannān dhvajapatākālaṃkṛcaturdikkān nānāgandhavidhūpitasāra...gandhānulepānuliptān,
SA11n1117:665: punaratraivāha-ātmānaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ niyātayannupasthānaṃ vā sarvabuddhānāmupādadāno rājyaṃ vā parityajan puṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathārhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vāpasṛjan yāvatsarvopabhogaparibhogān vā dadānaḥ,
SA11n1117:666: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānamapi bodhisattvo dadāno vividhān kalyāṇānudārān viśuddhānavikalāṃstiktāllavaṇān kaṭukān kaṣāyān nānārasāgropetān susnigdhān vividharasa vidhinopetān dhātukṣobhaṇasamatāsthāpanān cittaśarīrabalopastambhanān prītiprasādaprāmodyakalyatājananān yāvatsarvaparopakramapratiṣedhakān sarvavyādhiśamanānārogyasaṃjananān |
SA11n1117:667: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ śayanadānamāvāsadānamapāśrayadānaṃ pradīpadānaṃ ca |
SA11n1117:675: tatra tatra gurusaṃbhārāvavādaśikṣaṇaprayuktaḥ aśanavasanaṃ vā kṛpaṇavanīpakayācanakebhyo dadānaḥ,
SA11n1117:678: iti hi bodhisattvo hastyājāneyān dadānaḥ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitān ṣaṣṭihāyanān ṣaḍdantopetān padmavarṇān mukhaviśuddhān suvarṇālaṃkārān hemajālapraticchannaśarīrān nānāratnavicitrālaṃkārajālaśuṇḍaprakṣiptavyūhān suvarṇakalyāṇān kalyāṇa[cāru] darśanān aklāntayojanasahasragamanopacārān |
SA11n1117:680: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitramātāpitṛbhyaḥ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācanakebhyaḥ sarvajagatpratigrāhakebhyo muktacittatayā dadānaḥ,
SA11n1117:681: nāgṛhītacittatayāvasṛjan mahākaruṇāparisphuṭena saṃtānena mahātyāgaparimāṇabodhisattvaguṇeṣu pratipadyamāno'bhijātabodhisattvādhyāśayān pariśodhayamāno yāvat....iti hi bodhisattva āsanadānaṃ dadānaḥ parityajan rājabhadrāsanāni vaiḍūryapādakāni siṃhapratiṣṭhitāni suvarṇasūtraratnajālavitānānyanekacīvarasparśopetaprajñaptāni sarvasāragandhavāsitopacārāṇi vicitramaṇirājasamucchritadhvajānyanekaratnakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkāravyūhāni hemajālavitānavitatāni suvarṇakiṅkiṇījālasaṃghaṭitamanojñanādanirghoṣaśabdāni mahāntyāsanānyabhyudrato[dvidva] cakṣurdarśanānyekacchatramahāpṛthivyanuśāsananiṣpadanābhiṣiktāni |
SA11n1117:683: evaṃ yāvat.... iti hi bodhisattvaśchatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan mahāratnavyūhapratimaṇḍitāni ratnadaṇḍāni kiṅkiṇījālasaṃchannāni |
SA11n1117:685: tādṛśānāṃ chatrāṇāmanekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkārāṇāṃ tadatiriktāni ca asaṃkhyeyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkārāṇyanapekṣacitto dadānaḥ parityajannavasṛjannanuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā sattvasārebhyo nirvṛtānāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ caityālaṃkārāya dharmaparyeṣṭaye,
SA11n1117:694: evaṃ praṇidhānamutpādayati- kathametāni kuśalamūlāni sarvajagadupajīvyānyupakāribhūtāni bhaveyurviśuddhadharmaparyavasānāni,
SA11n1117:697: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayannevaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati-anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduḥkhaskandhavinivartanāya,
SA11n1117:712: maitracittaḥ premacittaḥ anugrahacitto hitacittaḥ sukhacittaḥ pariṇāmayati |
SA11n1117:713: taccaivaṃ pariṇāmayati-idaṃ mama kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ gativiśuddhaye saṃvarteta,
SA11n1117:723: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasattvāḥ sarvabuddhānārāgayeyuḥ,
SA11n1117:725: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādamabhedyaṃ pratilabheran |
SA11n1117:726: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ |
SA11n1117:745: yena ca sukhopadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatāstatsukhopadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasattvā bhaveyuriti |
SA11n1117:746: yathā ṣaṣṭhīpariṇāmanoktena vidhinā pariṇāmayati- sarvasattvā jñānāhārādbhavantu asaṅgaprayuktacetasaḥ,
SA11n1117:749: sarvasattvāḥ sarvarasāgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittāgrahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacintanaprayuktāḥ avipannayānā agrayānā uttamayānāḥ śīghrayānā mahāyānāḥ |
SA11n1117:770: sarvasattvāḥ pariśuddhabuddhakṣetrāvabhāsā bhavantu guṇavāsasuprayuktā āryāvāsaniketoccalitāḥ anuttarasarvabuddhavāsāvirahitāḥ |
SA11n1117:783: sarvasattvā apramāṇabhājanā bhavantu ākāśadhātuvipulāḥ smṛtīndriyopetāḥ sarvalaukikalokottarabhāvasaṃgrahaṇād grahaṇasmṛtyasaṃpramūḍhāḥ |
SA11n1117:790: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrātyāgacittānutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtānupālanatayā |
SA11n1117:801: āryagaganagañjasūtre'pyāha-mā bhūttanmama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānaṃ kauśalyaṃ vā yanna sarvasattvopajīvyaṃ syāditi ||
SA11n1117:811: tena cātmabhāvādinā baḍiśāmiṣeṇeva svayamanabhigatopabhogenāpyākṛṣya parānapi tārayati ||
SA11n1117:812: ata evoktaṃ ratnameghe-dānaṃ hi bodhisattvasya bodhiriti ||
